name: tttranscribe-test-suite
description: Comprehensive E2E test suite for TTTranscribe service

scripts.test:core: node -e "const Test = require('./journeys/CoreAPIJourney'); const test = new Test(require('./config')); test.run().then(r => process.exit(r.success ? 0 : 1));"
scripts.test:errors: node -e "const Test = require('./journeys/ErrorHandlingJourney'); const test = new Test(require('./config')); test.run().then(r => process.exit(r.success ? 0 : 1));"
scripts.test:cache: node -e "const Test = require('./journeys/CacheBehaviorJourney'); const test = new Test(require('./config')); test.run().then(r => process.exit(r.success ? 0 : 1));"
scripts.test:protocol: node -e "const Test = require('./journeys/ProtocolComplianceJourney'); const test = new Test(require('./config')); test.run().then(r => process.exit(r.success ? 0 : 1));"
scripts.test:performance: node -e "const Test = require('./journeys/PerformanceJourney'); const test = new Test(require('./config')); test.run().then(r => process.exit(r.success ? 0 : 1));"
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands: test, test:all, test:core, test:errors, test:cache, test:protocol, test:performance'

author: TTTranscribe Team
